content: Dear friends, we have decided to close  Harju 8 as of tomorrow (1.3) and open again when the times are better. Taking everything into consideration, we feel it's the right thing to do now. We feel really fortunate for being able to stay open all this time and hopefully in the end this shutdown will help us all to get a good spring and summer ğŸŒ See you on the other side â¤ï¸
